about_the_game:
SUMMARY


Magical Queen's Land is a survival horror cleaning game where we run a haunted park at night. Where hostile fantasy creatures navigate the place in search of visitors.. Avoid them! And get out before it's too late.

GAMEPLAY


With your few tools and your trusty mop, you're going to clean every inch of this place, empty the park's grimy garbage and clean the tables where disgusting visitors will leave their food scraps knowing that you will clean them up later..
Your time is limited, and the work has to be solid and organized, the attractions fail and tend to turn on late, so you will have to turn them off manually.
Unexplained events will delay your tasks and... If you take too long, the park will lock you up for security maintenance, alone in the dark with god knows what... What the hell is that?

❀ CORE FEATURES ❀


★ Cleaning progress in game.
  • With a real progress after finishing your services, keep a professional profile for the park.

★ Terrifying Supernatural AI
    Meet the Gnomes and The Queen, with a polished AI that will haunt you to death!
    They are inside their resting spot, but your service may disturb them, and begin their.. stalking.

★ Time management
  • Limited time means important decisions, being in the right place at the right time is key in this game.

★ Procedural Decayment
  • The more services you do in the game, the more rusty and decayed the place becomes.

★ Physics Based work
  • You can grab pretty much almost everything, the better you do at this, the more skilled you'll become in the service!

★ Sandbox Mode
    After you're done with the game, the horror continues! Give yourself a more cold challenge with your own rules.

★ Replayability
  • Each time you play.. The game becomes a different nightmare from it's procedural techniques! ¿How you will be haunted now?

★ Post-Isolation Events
  • ¿What was that? The game follows your experience, and plays with your environment and audio, from distorted unknown sounds to complete silence. The creatures can take advantage of this..

★ 3 Endings.
  • Depending on your choices during the game, you'll get one of them.



¿What is this place?


Welcome to Magical Queen's Land, an amusement park in its last week of operation, looking for new staff to maintain the park at night with its new organization.
Magical Queen's Land's Partner program, where prisoners do part-time duty to reduce their sentence, we play as one of them.

The Queen awaits..


After some tragic incidents in the park, the castle has been closed, and a large part of the workers have suffered serious accidents in the place, that is why we participate in the program.
Legends surround the site with an aura of cold and horror stories, a centuries-old cemetery, encounters with statues in the dark and the queen singing in the distance, waiting to leave her castle.
to greet the brave visitors of the night.

  • This game contains stressful scenarios, dark environment, flashing lights and sudden loud noises, viewer discretion is advised.
detailed_description:
SUMMARY


Magical Queen's Land is a survival horror cleaning game where we run a haunted park at night. Where hostile fantasy creatures navigate the place in search of visitors.. Avoid them! And get out before it's too late.

GAMEPLAY


With your few tools and your trusty mop, you're going to clean every inch of this place, empty the park's grimy garbage and clean the tables where disgusting visitors will leave their food scraps knowing that you will clean them up later..
Your time is limited, and the work has to be solid and organized, the attractions fail and tend to turn on late, so you will have to turn them off manually.
Unexplained events will delay your tasks and... If you take too long, the park will lock you up for security maintenance, alone in the dark with god knows what... What the hell is that?

❀ CORE FEATURES ❀


★ Cleaning progress in game.
  • With a real progress after finishing your services, keep a professional profile for the park.

★ Terrifying Supernatural AI
    Meet the Gnomes and The Queen, with a polished AI that will haunt you to death!
    They are inside their resting spot, but your service may disturb them, and begin their.. stalking.

★ Time management
  • Limited time means important decisions, being in the right place at the right time is key in this game.

★ Procedural Decayment
  • The more services you do in the game, the more rusty and decayed the place becomes.

★ Physics Based work
  • You can grab pretty much almost everything, the better you do at this, the more skilled you'll become in the service!

★ Sandbox Mode

★ Replayability

★ Post-Isolation Events

★ 3 Endings.
  • Depending on your choices during the game, you'll get one of them.

Welcome to Magical Queen's Land, an amusement park in its last week of operation, looking for new staff to maintain the park at night with its new organization.
Magical Queen's Land's Partner program, where prisoners do part-time duty to reduce their sentence, we play as one of them.

After some tragic incidents in the park, the castle has been closed, and a large part of the workers have suffered serious accidents in the place, that is why we participate in the program.

to greet the brave visitors of the night.

name: Magical Queen's Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 | 3.40Gh
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Welcome to Magical Queen's Land! Your new part-time cleaning job, clear your way through our gardens, playgrounds and rides as you do your best to finish and leave in time before our fantasy creatures come out to play with the last visitors.. It's just you.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
